CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial (Article 6 - Enforcement proceedings;Article 6-1 - Access to court);Violation of Article 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Protection of property (Article 1 para. 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Peaceful enjoyment of possessions)
JUDGES: Branko Lubarda;Georgios A. Serghides;Pere Pastor Vilanova
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .
CARDINAL . He was employed by Holding Kompanija “ Komgrap ” – DD “ Komgrap gradnja ” , a socially - owned company based in GPE ( hereinafter “ the debtor ” ) .

CARDINAL . On DATE , ORG ordered the debtor to pay the applicant specified amounts on account of salary arrears and social insurance contributions , plus the costs of the civil proceedings . This judgment became final on DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE , upon the applicant ’s request to that effect , ORG accepted the enforcement of the said judgment and further ordered the debtor to pay the applicant the enforcement costs .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG opened insolvency proceedings in respect of the debtor ( ORG ) .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant submitted his respective claims .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG dismissed these claims as out of time . ORG upheld that decision on DATE .
CARDINAL . NORP The insolvency proceedings against the debtor are still ongoing .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant lodged a constitutional appeal .
CARDINAL . ORG dismissed his appeal on DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant lodged a new constitutional appeal .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG dismissed again his appeal . On DATE that decision was delivered to the applicant .
